entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:48 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:48 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 10:48 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
